metadata.Title: CVE-2016-20011 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: libgrss through 0.7.0 fails to perform TLS certificate verification when downloading feeds, allowing remote attackers to manipulate the contents of feeds without detection. This occurs because of the default behavior of SoupSessionSync.

criterions.comment: libgrss: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
